access-token-not-retrieved: Access token could not be retrieved.
animation-delay: specifies a delay for the start of an animation
animation-direction: defines whether an animation should be played forwards, backwards or in alternate cycles
animation-duration: defines how long an animation should take to complete one cycle
animation-fill-mode: applies styles to its target before and after its execution
animation-intro: There animation parameters you can specify in the style are the following
animation-iteration-count: specifies the number of times an animation should be played
animation-name: specifies a name for the @keyframes animation
animation-play-state: specifies whether the animation is running or paused
animation-timing-function: specifies the speed curve of an animation
children-description: Content between opening and closing tag
confirm-tag-deletion: Are you sure you want to delete this element from the lesson?
copy-animation-to-clipboard: Click the Clipboard button and copy the value in the className attribute
directory-already-exists-msg: A directory with the chosen name already exists. Please pick a different name.
drag-preview-tooltip: Drag <1>{{title}}</1> to one of the <3></3> buttons
enter-password-isle-account: Enter the password associated with your ISLE account.
error-encountered-message: The following error was encountered while connecting to
export-lesson-intro: Package and export the currently opened lesson into a single-page application viewable in any web-browser.
font-size-description: Editor text height in number of pixels
form-control-connect-with-isle-account:
Connect with your ISLE user account. If you do not have one
yet, sign up at the ISLE dashboard, e.g. at
github-connect-error: Something went wrong while connecting to GitHub. Please try again.
id-description: Component identifier. Has to begin with a letter followed by letters, digits, hyphens ( - ), underscores ( _ ), colons ( : ), and periods ( . )
insert-at-line: Click to insert component at line {{lineNumber}}
insert-cursor-eol: Insert cursor at end of each line selected
invalid-server: The server address must start with <1>http://</1> or <3>https://</3>.
lesson-name-invalid: Please provide a lesson name of lowercase characters without spaces.
lesson-uploaded: The lesson has been uploaded successfully and can be accessed at the following address:
link-to-github-account: You can link the ISLE editor with your GitHub account for enhanced GitHub integration.
link-to-github-account-authenticated: You will be able to link the ISLE editor to your GitHub account after authenticating with an ISLE Server.
linked-to-isle-server: You are linked to the ISLE server at <1>{{server}}</1> with user <3>{{email}}</3>.
linting-tooltip: Click to cycle through lint error and spelling error messages
load-from-cdn-tooltip: WARNING: Disabling this option will massively increase upload time and bundle sizes
login-failed: Couldn't login to server. Please check the address and port.
minify-code-tooltip: Disabling this option slightly reduces build time but results in more data to be downloaded by users
modify-animation: In case you want to modify the animation speed or background-image, you can copy the respective style template into your element
new-version-available: A new version ({{newVersion}}) is available for download:
no-courses-found-msg: Please create a course on the ISLE dashboard or request to be added as an owner to an existing course.
no-update-available: There is currently no update available...
open-tag-wizard: Click to open component wizard for <{{tagName}} />
outer-title-multiline: Double-click to highlight source code for <{{tagName}} /> (L{{startLineNumber}}-{{endLineNumber}})
outer-title-single: Double-click to highlight source code for <{{tagName}} /> (L{{startLineNumber}})
overwrite-lesson-msg: A lesson with the name <1>{{lessonName}}</1> is already present in the namespace. Please confirm that you wish to overwrite the lesson or cancel the upload procedure and choose a different name.
preview-lesson-role: Preview lesson as user with selected role
preview-tooltip: Click to toggle fullscreen preview of lesson
save-stats-tooltip: Create a `stats.json` file with bundle statistics for debugging and analysis purposes
select-all: Select all occurrences of Find match
switch-online-offline: Switch between offline and online mode
update-available-tooltip: Click on the button to the right to initiate download
update-downloaded-tooltip: New version of ISLE editor will be installed upon closing the application
update-downloading-tooltip: Please do not exit while download is in progress
upload-lesson-msg: Upload and deploy currently opened lesson directly to connected ISLE server.
upload-lesson-warning: You need to connect the ISLE editor to an ISLE server under settings before you can upload lessons.
wizard-table-instructions: Click on the box to toggle the respective options on and off and set their values:
